name: Less Than Human
description:
Take the role of a 16-year-old high school girl who gets newly diagnosed with autism. It's about 4300 words inspired by my own experiences with diagnosis in adulthood, and the experiences of other people I know who got diagnosed later on.

It's a short story. -shrug-

If you want to support autistics, check out the Autistic Self-Advocacy Network, linked inside the game. There are lots of people who could use your understanding, acceptance, and support.
